mention.text: a new theory of discourse structure that stresses the role of purpose and processing in discourse
The attentional state , being dynamic , records the objects , properties , and relations that are salient at each point of the discourse .
an abstraction of the focus of attention of the participants
the processing of utterances in a discourse
